definitions.definition: To transport via a motor bus.
To transport students to school, often to a more distant school for the purposes of achieving racial integration.
(food service) To clear meal remains from.
definitions.example: He bussed tables as the restaurant emptied out.

definitions.definition: (food service) To work at clearing the remains of meals from tables or counters; to work as a busboy.
definitions.example: He’s been bussing for minimum wage.
